forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a cheerful expanse of blue sky, devoid of the fog that often cloaks the city. Sunshine spills lazily over the iconic skyline, with the temperature gently settling around a refreshing 62 degrees. The West Southwest winds carry a brisk energy, with their playful gusts adding an invigorating touch to the atmosphere. Though hints of scattered clouds might drift in, they do little to obfuscate the bright charm of the day. 

As the evening approaches, expect a softened palette, with temperatures dipping to a comfortable low of around 52 degrees. The wind will continue its subtle chorus, providing just enough coolness to warrant a light jacket or sweater. It’s a fine evening to stroll along the waterfront, perhaps pausing to enjoy a warm beverage from a local café, letting the treasures of the day linger just a bit longer under the fading light. Alternatively, a casual gathering with friends outdoors would complement the pleasant conditions beautifully, offering a chance to savor the evening's serenity.
